body:
It's always really bothered me how Minecraft looks like such a cartoony game yet has such good shading. It's time to change that!

Minimalist resource pack (E1): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CkVyKhobpcM

MLG SHOE TYING TUTORIAL- https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qzh6qPdh_oc
Episode 17: Rushing tutorial- https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=a486Amwp4Ls
Episode 15: PVP montage- https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PBMg1Sbya6c
Episode 14: Kohi killstreak- https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TXtoqxWNWK0
Episode 13: Montage- https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SWrZrXxOUjQ&list=UUufDgYExmmatP2xj-HzOXBQ
Episode 8: Nebula commentary- https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1kDdL8cHkoQ&list=UUufDgYExmmatP2xj-HzOXBQ

title: Minimalist resource pack timelapse!

replies.body:
Hey, mind if I ask where you got that texture pack? Would be appreciated.

That was an amazing montage, omg :D I can tell you put a lot of effort into those monument breaking scenes, and the timing with the music is spot-on!
Also, you're insanely good on Venomous, just saying :P

But seriously I need that texture pack.
